featured.text: The breathtaking 4,000-foot cliffs of Na Pali Coast rise grandly from the sea.

definition.zh_def: 巴利語，一種古老的印度語言，主要用於佛教經典。
definition.en_def: Pali is an ancient Indian language used primarily in Buddhist scriptures.
definition.example: The teachings of the Buddha are often studied in Pali.
